name: Block Heads: Instakill
description: Shoot and double jump your way through fast, kinetic, and blocky action in this one-hit, one-kill FPS as you secure your score. With customization galore: skins, hats, outfits, guns, maps, music, so much that you can't ignore! Co-op map editing, need I say more? Oh, and there are active ragdolls.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core2Quad Q6600 2.40 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Processor: Intel Core I5-4440 3.10 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
